newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan buys 98,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat at tender.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan buys 98,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat at tender.

text.p: The Taiwan Flour Mills Association on Friday bought three shipments totalling 98,000 tonnes of U.S. No.1 or No.2 wheat, traders said.
Cargill, Mitsui, Continental and Louis Dreyfus Corp supplied parts of the three shipments.
Each shipment contains Dark Northern Spring (DNS), Hard Red Winter (HRW) and White Wheat (WW) and all are slated for delivery from the Pacific Northwest.
Details for the tender are as follow:
Shipment Type Tonnes Date Price freight
